column5: a buddy wanted to go fishing with me so i left the kayak at home and took out the canoe while in the shallows i saw a small muskie sunning himself, so my first cast of the day got me this guy with a bucktail  thought it was gonna be a great morning of fishing, but it was dam cold, and we didnt get anything, so we packed it in at 9:30 am  maybe next time!

Nice muskie!  At least you hooked into that one.  The waters looked a bit rough where you were...and you did look cold.  We went to the place you recommended, and caught a few small fish, but at least there was no skunk today.  Thanks for the tip by the way!  Next time we'll go there without the little one...we had to find places between the thick weeds for her to plunk a worm on a bobber down.  I'd have like to have fished the thick weeds a little more.  Oh well...still had a great day out there.
Nice fish!!  LOL... its friggin cold out!!
Nice colours on that little guy!
Nice fish mang!!! at least you got one, the fish sure won on my vacation
Nice short Muskie!  Put some damn clothes on and it won't feel so damn cold eh!!!
Great pics. You do look like you're freezing in the second one. GCD's right though, August or not, gotta dress for it. At least in the kayak you can warm up by paddling.
That's a beauty. First cast you lucky devil!!   Nice!
